Text: confirms your brief conversation with my colleague Tom Simmons We represent Rob Krebs and Matt Rose at Burlington Northern Santa Fe and would like to discuss you giving consideration to joining their Board of Directors Of course you know Marc Shapiro of JP Morgan Chase Ed Whitacre of SBC and Steven Whisler of Phelps Dodge who are on that Board If your assistant could call Cindy Langford in my office to arrange a date and time for us to talk I will fill you in on more details Thanks for your consideration Dan Dan Cruse Vice Chairman Spencer Stuart VOICE FAX EMAIL Internet
